title: How to Contact Tucker Carlson Online & Submit a Story

steps.title: No, Tucker doesn’t have a public phone number or email address.
steps.content: No, Tucker doesn’t have a public phone number or email address. Although you can’t contact Tucker directly, you can reach out to his team at the Tucker Carlson Network . For all general inquiries, send an email to info@TCNetwork.com . Otherwise, you can: [1] X Research source Email support@TCNetwork.com if you need help with a subscription, have questions about any products, or want to contact customer service. Email bugs@TCNetwork.com to report bugs and technical issues on his website. Email advertise@TCNetwork.com to connect with his advertising team.

steps.title: Email Tucker Carlson with a story at tips@TCNetwork.com.
steps.content: Email Tucker Carlson with a story at tips@TCNetwork.com . If there’s a story that you think Tucker should cover, send a news tip at tips@TCNetwork.com . Keep in mind that he receives a large volume of tips each day, so he might not be able to respond to you. [2] X Research source If you’re a journalist trying to get an interview with Tucker, reach out to his press team at press@TCNetwork.com .

steps.title: Provide the essential details when sending a story or tip.
steps.content: Provide the essential details when sending a story or tip. Since Tucker’s team receives countless emails every day, it’s important to get straight to the point. Briefly introduce yourself, then pitch your story in a clear, concise, and objective way. After sharing the details, explain why you think the story should be covered, provide your contact information, and thank the other person for their time. If possible, provide photos, videos, or sources to support your claims. Reporters and news outlets are usually busy, so keep your email to one paragraph or less to increase the likelihood of it being read.

steps.title: Leave a comment or direct message Tucker on his social media accounts.
steps.content: Leave a comment or direct message Tucker on his social media accounts. While Tucker doesn’t typically reply to social media messages, it doesn’t hurt to try! Tag his social media handle in your comment or post to get his attention. The only official pages run by Tucker and his team include: [3] X Research source X (formerly known as Twitter) Facebook Instagram YouTube Rumble

steps.title: Book signings
steps.content: Book signings In the past, Tucker has attended book signings, so keep tabs on his social media to see when he’s coming out with a new book. If he’s doing a book signing near you, find out when and where the event will be and show up early to meet him in person.

steps.title: Charity events
steps.content: Charity events If you want to meet Tucker in real life, attending charity events that he supports could be a great opportunity to spark a conversation with him. steps.title: Tucker Carlson is an American conservative political commentator.
steps.content: Tucker Carlson is an American conservative political commentator. He’s known for his fiery rhetoric and extreme viewpoints on various political and social issues, including his support for white nationalism and anti-immigrant policies. From 2016 to 2023, he hosted the nightly talk show, Tucker Carlson Tonight, on Fox News and was coined “the most influential voice in right-wing media.” Since he was fired from Fox News, he hosts his own show, Tucker, on X.
